description:
Recycled synthetic down insulation and a pop of gold thermal-reflective lining keep you toasty on cold hikes.
The synthetic insulation squishes down for easy packing without losing loft, and it stays warm even when wet.
Varied baffles and a mix of fabric finishes sets this puffer apart.
name: Columbia Sportswear Labyrinth Loop Hooded Jacket - Big - Mens
